data.title: Salamanca, NY
data.meta_description: May weather forecast for Salamanca, New York: The last month of the spring, May, is an enjoyable month in Salamanca, New York, with an average temperature varying between 65.5°F (18.6°C) and 45.7°F (7.6°C). In Salamanca, during the entire year, snow falls for 75.5 days and aggregates up to 34.17" (868mm) of snow.
data.text:
Average high temperature in May: 65.5°F

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (77.5°F).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (28°F).

Average low temperature in May: 45.7°F

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (57°F).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (16.2°F).

Average snowfall in May

Salamanca, NY

Average snowfall in May: 0.16"

The month with the highest snowfall is February (8.98").

The months with the least snowfall are June, July, August and September (0").

Average snowfall days in May

Salamanca, NY

Average snowfall days in May: 0.8 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (18.3 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August and September (0 days).

Average daylight in May /

Average sunshine in May

Salamanca, NY

Average daylight in May: 14h and 4min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 12min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 9h and 12min).

Average sunshine in May: 8h and 2min

The months with the most sunshine are July and August (Average sunshine: 9h and 42min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 2h and 18min).

Average UV index in May

Salamanca, NY

Average UV index in May: 4

The months with the highest UV index are June, July and August (UV index 5).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February and December (UV index 1).

Average visibility in May

Salamanca, NY

Average visibility in May: 5mi

The months with the highest visibility are March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (5mi).

The months with the lowest visibility are January and February (4mi).
